activatepipeline.name: ActivatePipeline
activatepipeline.description: Grants permission to validate the specified pipeline and starts processing pipeline tasks. If the pipeline does not pass validation, activation fails

addtags.name: AddTags
addtags.description: Grants permission to add or modify tags for the specified pipeline

createpipeline.name: CreatePipeline
createpipeline.description: Grants permission to create a new, empty pipeline

deactivatepipeline.name: DeactivatePipeline
deactivatepipeline.description: Grants permission to Deactivate the specified running pipeline

deletepipeline.name: DeletePipeline
deletepipeline.description: Grants permission to delete a pipeline, its pipeline definition, and its run history

describeobjects.name: DescribeObjects
describeobjects.description: Grants permission to get the object definitions for a set of objects associated with the pipeline

describepipelines.name: DescribePipelines
describepipelines.description: Grants permission to retrieves metadata about one or more pipelines

evaluateexpression.name: EvaluateExpression
evaluateexpression.description: Grants permission to task runners to call EvaluateExpression, to evaluate a string in the context of the specified object

getpipelinedefinition.name: GetPipelineDefinition
getpipelinedefinition.description: Grants permission to gets the definition of the specified pipeline

listpipelines.name: ListPipelines
listpipelines.description: Grants permission to list the pipeline identifiers for all active pipelines that you have permission to access

pollfortask.name: PollForTask
pollfortask.description: Grants permission to task runners to call PollForTask, to receive a task to perform from AWS Data Pipeline

putpipelinedefinition.name: PutPipelineDefinition
putpipelinedefinition.description: Grants permission to add tasks, schedules, and preconditions to the specified pipeline

queryobjects.name: QueryObjects
queryobjects.description: Grants permission to query the specified pipeline for the names of objects that match the specified set of conditions

removetags.name: RemoveTags
removetags.description: Grants permission to remove existing tags from the specified pipeline

reporttaskprogress.name: ReportTaskProgress
reporttaskprogress.description: Grants permission to task runners to call ReportTaskProgress, when they are assigned a task to acknowledge that it has the task

reporttaskrunnerheartbeat.name: ReportTaskRunnerHeartbeat
reporttaskrunnerheartbeat.description: Grants permission to task runners to call ReportTaskRunnerHeartbeat every 15 minutes to indicate that they are operational

setstatus.name: SetStatus
setstatus.description: Grants permission to requests that the status of the specified physical or logical pipeline objects be updated in the specified pipeline

settaskstatus.name: SetTaskStatus
settaskstatus.description: Grants permission to task runners to call SetTaskStatus to notify AWS Data Pipeline that a task is completed and provide information about the final status

validatepipelinedefinition.name: ValidatePipelineDefinition
validatepipelinedefinition.description: Grants permission to validate the specified pipeline definition to ensure that it is well formed and can be run without error
